name: Dominio
description:
Wandering through far away lands in the mountains, you find a mysterious tower. Little did you know that this isn't an ordinary tower. This seemingly harmless building is cursed to those who enter. It's victims are doomed to go through floor and floor of traps, trials, and tribulation endlessly.

This wouldn't be too bad if the tower weren't also sinking into the earth being flooded with LAVA! Think about stopping and you will be burned to a crisp. Your only salvation, if you want to call it that, is to do the tower's bidding and climb.

This game was made for Buddy Jam 3! Please support the creators however you can.
